title: Pac-12 Media Day
description:
Joe Tessitore, Sam Acho and Rod Gilmore react to Pac-12 Commissioner George Kilavkoff's comments from Pac-12 Media Day and discuss the state of the Pac-12 with USC and UCLA slated to leave for the Big Ten in 2024. Plus, USC coach Lincoln Riley, Oregon coach Dan Lanning and Utah coach Kyle Whittingham join the show.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: CFB Live: The crew breaks down the top storylines from Pac-12 Media Day
